import profilePic from '../images/profile-pic.jpg' import { collection, orderBy, query, limit } from 'firebase/firestore'; import { db } from '../backend/firebase-config'; import { useCollectionData } from 'react-firebase-hooks/firestore'; export default function ChatRoom() { const messagesRef = collection(db, "messages") const q = query(messagesRef, orderBy('createdAt'), limit(25)) const [messages] = useCollectionData(q, {idField: 'id'}) return ( <>
